item.description:
O'Porto Restaurant is having a fith anniversary price-fixed menu celebration in March. For $20.74, choose one thing for each course. Add $17 if you want the wine with each course. RSVP's are mandatory by March 28 so we can make a reservation.

Here's the menu for March 30:

Choice of One Appetizers for Each
Salada à Portuguesa

Iceberg Lettuce, Carrot Strings, Ripe Tomatoes, Marinated Olives, and Cucumber House Vinaigrette

Salada a Casa
Salad Greens, Marinated Olives, Ripe Tomatoes, and Cucumbers with an Herb Vinaigrette

Sopa de Vegetais
Carrot, Pumpkin Puree with Julienne Carrots and Collard Greens
Caldo Verde

Traditional Portuguese Soup, with Potato Puree and Kale, Garnished with Chouriço

Camarão Alhinho
Sautéed Shrimp in Garlic Butter Cream Sauce
Folhados Recheados
Spring-Roll Stuffed with Shrimp and Crab in a Tomato Broth

Wine: Caves da Cepa (Green Wine) or Grão Vasco - 07 White or Red (Dão) Northern Central Region)

Choice of one Main Course for Each

Osso Buco de Tamburil

Portuguese Style Bouillabaisse of Monk Fish, Shrimp. Served in a Tomato, Onion Broth with a Side of Saffron Rice

Caril de Camarão
Curried Shrimp made with Madras Special Curry served with White Rice

Peito de Pato
Duck Breast Served with Sautéed Vegetables, Snow Peas in Orange Sauce with Toasted Almonds

Linguado Grelhado
Grilled Fillet of Sole, Roasted Potato, sautéed Vegetables in a Lemon-Butter Sauce Wine Sauce
Wine: Eximius - 07 White or Red or Foral Red - 07

Choice of One Dessert for Each

Mousse de Chocolate

Chocolate mousse

Pudim flan

Chef De Sousa’s Family Recipe for Traditional Portuguese Egg custard with caramel sauce

Arroz Doce

Rice pudding

Wine: Fonseca Port Ruby or Tawny or Licor Beirão
item.name: Ethnic Dining Goes Portuguese
